member.name: T:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase
member.summary: Base class for the toggle switch control.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase._isMouseCaptured
member.summary: True if the mouse has been captured by this control, false otherwise.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase._isSpaceKeyDown
member.summary: True if the SPACE key is currently pressed, false otherwise.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase._isMouseLeftButtonDown
member.summary: True if the mouse's left button is currently down, false otherwise.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase._mousePosition
member.summary: Last known position of the mouse with respect to this Button.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase._suspendStateChanges
member.summary: True if visual state changes are suspended; false otherwise.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ToggleSwitchBase class.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnDragCompleted(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the dragging of the Thumb has completed.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.LayoutControls
member.summary: Recalculated the layout of the control.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnDragStarted(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raised when a drag has started on the Thumb.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnClick
member.summary: Called when the control is clicked.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnSizeChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the size of the control has changed.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ReleaseMouseCaptureInternal
member.summary: Release mouse capture if we already had it.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnLayoutDependancyPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raised when a dependency property that affects the control's layout has changed.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnIsEnabledChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the IsEnabled property changes.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnGotFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the GotFocus event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnLostFocus(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the LostFocus event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the KeyDown event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnKeyDownInternal(System.Windows.Input.Key)
member.summary: Handles the KeyDown event for ButtonBase.
member.param: The keyboard key associated with the event.
member.returns: True if the event was handled, false otherwise.
member.remarks: This method exists for the purpose of unit testing since we can't set KeyEventArgs.Key to simulate key press events.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the KeyUp event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnKeyUpInternal(System.Windows.Input.Key)
member.summary: Handles the KeyUp event for ButtonBase.
member.param: The keyboard key associated with the event.
member.returns: True if the event was handled, false otherwise.
member.remarks: This method exists for the purpose of unit testing since we can't set KeyEventArgs.Key to simulate key press events.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnMouseEnter(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the MouseEnter event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnMouseLeave(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the MouseLeave event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the MouseLeftButtonDown event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the MouseLeftButtonUp event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.param: The event data for the MouseMove event.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsValidMousePosition
member.summary: Determine if the mouse is above the button based on its last known position.
member.returns: True if the mouse is considered above the button, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ChangeCheckStates(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the control's layout to reflect the current IsChecked state.
member.param: Whether to use transitions during the layout change.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.Offset
member.summary: The current offset of the Thumb.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.CheckedOffset
member.summary: The current offset of the Thumb when it's in the Checked state.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.UncheckedOffset
member.summary: The current offset of the Thumb when it's in the Unchecked state.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.DragOffset
member.summary: The offset of the thumb while it's being dragged.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsDragging
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the thumb position is being manipulated.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsPressed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether a ToggleSwitch is currently pressed.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsFocused
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.
member.remarks: IsFocused will not be set until OnFocus has been called. It may not yet have been set if you check it in your own Focus event handler.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsMouseOver
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse pointer is located over this element.
member.remarks: IsMouseOver will not be set until MouseEnter has been called. It may not yet have been set if you check it in your own MouseEnter event handler.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ContentTemplate
member.summary: The template applied to the Checked and Unchecked content properties.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.CheckedContent
member.summary: The content shown on the checked side of the toggle switch

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.CheckedForeground
member.summary: The brush used for the foreground of the checked side of the toggle switch.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.CheckedBackground
member.summary: The brush used for the background of the checked side of the toggle switch.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.UncheckedContent
member.summary: The content shown on the unchecked side of the toggle switch.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.UncheckedForeground
member.summary: The brush used for the foreground of the Unchecked side of the toggle switch.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.UncheckedBackground
member.summary: The brush used for the background of the Unchecked side of the toggle switch.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.Elasticity
member.summary: Determines the percentage of the way the thumb must be dragged before the switch changes it's IsChecked state.
member.remarks: This value must be within the range of 0.0 - 1.0.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ThumbBrush
member.summary: The brush used to fill the thumb.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ThumbSize
member.summary: The size of the toggle switch's thumb.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.IsChecked
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control is in the checked state.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.ZoomFactor
member.remarks: This property is used in conjunction with the Application.Current.Host.Content.ZoomFactor property to correctly handle mouse drag events at different browser zoom levels.

member.name: E:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.Unchecked
member.summary: Event raised when the toggle switch is unchecked.

member.name: E:ToggleSwitch.ToggleSwitchBase.Checked
member.summary: Event raised when the toggle switch is checked.

member.name: T:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder
member.summary: A border that clips its contents.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._bottomLeftClip
member.summary: Stores the clip responsible for clipping the bottom left corner.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._bottomLeftContentControl
member.summary: Stores the bottom left content control.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._bottomRightClip
member.summary: Stores the clip responsible for clipping the bottom right corner.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._bottomRightContentControl
member.summary: Stores the bottom right content control.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._topLeftClip
member.summary: Stores the clip responsible for clipping the top left corner.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._topLeftContentControl
member.summary: Stores the top left content control.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._topRightClip
member.summary: Stores the clip responsible for clipping the top right corner.

member.name: F:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder._topRightContentControl
member.summary: Stores the top right content control.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Gets the UI elements out of the template.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder.UpdateClipContent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates whether the content is clipped.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the border corner radius. This is a thickness, as there is a problem parsing CornerRadius types.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.ClippingBorder.ClipContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content is clipped.

member.name: T:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder
member.summary: Content control that draws a glow around its inside.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.InnerGlowColorChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Updates the inner glow color when the DP changes.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.ClipContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content is clipped.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.ContentZIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the content z-index. 0 for behind shadow, 1 for in-front.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.InnerGlowOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner glow opacity.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.InnerGlowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner glow color.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.InnerGlowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner glow size.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.InnerGlowBorder.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the border corner radius. This is a thickness, as there is a problem parsing CornerRadius types.

member.name: T:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder
member.summary: Content control that draws and outer glow around itself.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Gets the parts out of the template.

member.name: M:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.OuterGlowColorChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Updates the outer glow color when the DP changes.

member.summary: Updates the gradient stops on the drop shadow.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.ClipContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content is clipped.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.OuterGlowOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer glow opacity.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.OuterGlowSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer glow size.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.OuterGlowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer glow color.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.CornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the border corner radius. This is a thickness, as there is a problem parsing CornerRadius types.

member.name: P:ToggleSwitch.Borders.OuterGlowBorder.ShadowCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the border corner radius. This is a thickness, as there is a problem parsing CornerRadius types.
